name: Alphaus Inc.
description: Developer of a software-as-a-service platform designed to seamlessly automate the daily operations of cloud lifecycle management. The company's platform helps AWS (Amazon Web Services), Azure & Google Cloud partners, and user enterprises to understand complicated cloud spend, allocate it to each client or business unit with accuracy, and optimize it with a better way of procurement, enabling businesses to optimize their cloud costs via accounts, tags, products or departments.
one_liner: Developer of a software-as-a-service platform designed to seamlessly automate the daily operations of cloud lifecycle management. The company's platform helps AWS (Amazon Web Services), Azure & Google Cloud partners, and user enterprises to understand complicated cloud spend, allocate it to each client or business unit with accuracy, and optimize it with a better way of procurement, enabling businesses to optimize their cloud costs via accounts, tags, products or departments.

name: Crafting, Inc.
description: Developer of a fully managed cloud development environment platform designed to provide a full-fledged developer environment on the cloud for multi-service apps. The company's platform offers production-like development environments on cloud, up and running with one click to code, run, test, debug and preview their end-to-end product instantly and interactively on cloud, enabling customers to develop and test applications in a production-like environment, without having to worry about managing and maintaining infrastructure.
one_liner: Developer of a fully managed cloud development environment platform designed to provide a full-fledged developer environment on the cloud for multi-service apps. The company's platform offers production-like development environments on cloud, up and running with one click to code, run, test, debug and preview their end-to-end product instantly and interactively on cloud, enabling customers to develop and test applications in a production-like environment, without having to worry about managing and maintaining infrastructure.

name: Deben TMS
description: Developer of a financial platform designed to control multiple bank accounts in real-time with one view. The company's platform offers a system that is integrated and controlled automatically through cash reporting, forecasting, analysis, reconciliation, and bank integrations, helping businesses to analyze, report, and forecast cash flow, faster through integrations with all the bank accounts.
one_liner: Developer of a financial platform designed to control multiple bank accounts in real-time with one view. The company's platform offers a system that is integrated and controlled automatically through cash reporting, forecasting, analysis, reconciliation, and bank integrations, helping businesses to analyze, report, and forecast cash flow, faster through integrations with all the bank accounts.

name: 1108 TECH
description: Developer of an application programming interface (API) system designed to connect WhatsApp for business purposes. The company's platform allows support, sales, and operation through an inbox and automated conversation flows, enabling businesses to drive more revenue and improve the productivity of the support team by automating repetitive tasks.
one_liner: Developer of an application programming interface (API) system designed to connect WhatsApp for business purposes. The company's platform allows support, sales, and operation through an inbox and automated conversation flows, enabling businesses to drive more revenue and improve the productivity of the support team by automating repetitive tasks.

name: Good Morning Ser Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of a metaverse integrated platform intended to facilitate non-fungible token trading. The company's platform assists creators in launching customized non-fungible tokens to connect and engage with their fanbase and community in real-time, enabling content creators to have an easy and cost-effective medium of connecting fans.
one_liner: Operator of a metaverse integrated platform intended to facilitate non-fungible token trading. The company's platform assists creators in launching customized non-fungible tokens to connect and engage with their fanbase and community in real-time, enabling content creators to have an easy and cost-effective medium of connecting fans.

name: Krunch Lab Limited
description: Developer of cloud-based marketing analytic tool catering to its clients in Hong Kong. The company's software helps its clients to do social monitoring, channel attribution, user segmentation and predictive analytics in the developer context, helping the marketing field in analyzing the rapidly growing audience.
one_liner: Developer of cloud-based marketing analytic tool catering to its clients in Hong Kong. The company's software helps its clients to do social monitoring, channel attribution, user segmentation and predictive analytics in the developer context, helping the marketing field in analyzing the rapidly growing audience.

name: Monak E-Services Holdings Limited
description: Developer of a fintech platform intended to provide financial inclusion and life services to migrants via partnered networks in the Middle East. The company's platform aims to solve the struggles that migrants are facing coming to the Middle East by providing end-to-end life services to create a comfortable and stress-free living, enabling users to get health, beauty, payment, and delivery solutions within a single application.
one_liner: Developer of a fintech platform intended to provide financial inclusion and life services to migrants via partnered networks in the Middle East. The company's platform aims to solve the struggles that migrants are facing coming to the Middle East by providing end-to-end life services to create a comfortable and stress-free living, enabling users to get health, beauty, payment, and delivery solutions within a single application.

name: Reddit, Inc.
description: Reddit Inc is engaged in providing internet content. The company provides online services that include gaming, sports, business, crypto, television and others.
one_liner: Reddit Inc is engaged in providing internet content. The company provides online services that include gaming, sports, business, crypto, television and others.

name: UNCODIE, CORP.
description: Developer of AI-based no-code platform designed to create technology and access capital. The company's platform connects apps to custom databases or third-party tools, uses AI to generate clean and reusable code from components and screens and select a variety of frameworks and languages, enabling clients to help build web applications.
one_liner: Developer of AI-based no-code platform designed to create technology and access capital. The company's platform connects apps to custom databases or third-party tools, uses AI to generate clean and reusable code from components and screens and select a variety of frameworks and languages, enabling clients to help build web applications.

name: Wellxai Technologies Ltd
description: Opeartor of an insurance technology intended to support wellness activities. The company aims to disrupt the insurance landscape in the region by offering individuals, families, corporates, and SMEs health insurance that incentivizes engagement in various wellness activities such as gym visits, healthy eating, focusing on mental wellness, utilizing wearable tech, and also provides a third-party embedded device along with an application that monitors health, enabling users to make efficient insurance decisions.
one_liner: Opeartor of an insurance technology intended to support wellness activities. name: Payment24 Group Proprietary Limited
description: Provider of a fuel payment and fleet management system created for fleet management. The company's fleet management system integrates into gas stations and vehicles, enabling fleet owners and managers to reduce fraud and increase efficiencies.
one_liner: Provider of a fuel payment and fleet management system created for fleet management. The company's fleet management system integrates into gas stations and vehicles, enabling fleet owners and managers to reduce fraud and increase efficiencies.
